mapper.sql: id, author_id, parent_cmt_id, content, reply_to_id, create_time
${alias}.id, ${alias}.author_id AS authorId, ${alias}.parent_cmt_id AS parentCmtId, ${alias}.content, ${alias}.reply_to_id AS replyToId, ${alias}.create_time AS createTime,
mapper.select: SELECT vcc.author_id authorId, u.name, u.avatar, vcc.content, vcc.reply_to_id replyToId, vcc.reply_to_name replyToName, vcc.create_time createTime FROM video_cmt_child vcc LEFT JOIN user u ON vcc.author_id = u.id WHERE vcc.parent_cmt_id = #{cmtId} ORDER BY vcc.create_time DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{size}
